November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

1 day ago - In 2004, Toys "R" Us sued Amazon, ... third-party sellers to offer items on the service in categories that Toys "R" Us had been granted exclusivity. In 2006, a court ruled in favor of Toys "R" Us, giving it the right to unwind its agreement with Amazon and establish its independent e-commerce website. The company was later awarded $51 million in damages. In 2001, Amazon entered into a similar agreement with Borders, under which Amazon would comanage Borders.com as a co-branded ...

t: It's Our Job to Shop: These Are the Amazon Brands to Keep on Your Radar
s: Amazon Luxury Stores isn’t a brand, but a storefront that gathers all the luxury, designer items on the platform in one handy place. It offers everything from Oscar de la Renta earrings to pre-loved Gucci bags and tons of sale items from brands such as Patbo, Silvia Tcherassi, and Altuzarra.
